name: Olaf Titel
bio: Senior Software Architect and Technical Leader with 20+ years of experience building secure, scalable, cloud-native platforms. Formerly at T-Systems, Volkswagen, and Gematik. Co-founder & CTO of fluidX.digital, a browser-based AR/video collaboration platform using WebRTC and pixel streaming. Expert in architecture, DevOps, CI/CD, and data-driven cloud solutions.
